title: My Daily Routine
description: Read about a typical workday routine.

passage.text:
My name is Minho and I work as a marketing assistant at a company in Seoul. I want to tell you about my typical weekday.

I wake up at 6:30 every morning. First, I take a quick shower and get dressed. Then I have breakfast - usually just coffee and toast because I don't have much time. I leave home at 7:30 and commute to work by subway. The journey takes about 45 minutes.

I arrive at the office around 8:15. I usually start by checking my emails and planning my tasks for the day. We have team meetings every Monday and Wednesday morning. I often work on presentations and reports. My colleagues are friendly, and we sometimes have lunch together at a restaurant near the office.

I finish work at 6 p.m., but sometimes I work overtime when there's a deadline. After work, I usually go to the gym twice a week. On other days, I just go home and relax. I try to go to bed before midnight because I need enough sleep.

Weekends are different. I rarely wake up before 9 a.m. I spend time with friends, watch movies, or just rest at home.

vocabulary.meaning: a person who helps with advertising and promotion
to travel regularly between home and work
the act of traveling from one place to another
the time by which something must be done

questions.explanation: The passage says 'I work as a marketing assistant.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I wake up at 6:30 every morning.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I commute to work by subway.'

questions.explanation: The passage says 'The journey takes about 45 minutes.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'We have team meetings every Monday and Wednesday morning.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I usually start by checking my emails.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'we sometimes have lunch together at a restaurant.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I finish work at 6 p.m.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I usually go to the gym twice a week.'

questions.explanation: Minho says 'I rarely wake up before 9 a.m.' on weekends.

questions.explanation: Minho says 'usually just coffee and toast.'
